tool_description: Loads existing audio files from various formats and prepares them for editing and processing operations.

file_path.description: Full path to the audio file to load

normalize_on_load.description: Apply normalization when loading the file

error_messages: File not found: Check that the file_path exists and is accessible.
Unsupported format: Use supported audio formats (WAV, MP3, FLAC, AIFF, OGG).
Corrupted file: The audio file appears to be corrupted or incomplete.
Permission denied: Ensure read permissions for the specified file.
usage: Provide the file_path to an existing audio file. Optionally enable normalize_on_load for consistent levels.

track_id.description: Unique identifier for the loaded track

sample_rate.description: Original sample rate of the file
